The Wahl KMXWahl Animal is with you whether you're in the barn, preparing for a show, or in the ring. The KMX comes standard with the fitter-favored X-Block® blade, which powers through becoming oils and glues at two high clipping speeds: 3,700 and 4,500 SPM. The days before a show can be long, tiring, and hard, that's why Wahl Animal designed the KMX with an ergonomic design to be completely balanced on your hand and avoid wrist and arm fatigue. The KMX also comes with an 18-foot heavy-duty, rubberized charging cord to resist barn messes and mishaps, reducing your stress in the course of the busy season of little things like finding and using extension cords or ruining your charger. Differences Between KM CordlessTM and KMXTM: The KM Cordless operates at 3,000 and 3,700 SPM, while the KMX Cordless operates at 3,700 and 4,500 SPM.
